	var numbers = "";
	var greatestProduct = 0;
	var bestCombination = 0;
	var subStringLength = 13;
	generateSubstring();

	function generateSubstring(){
		var tempProduct;
		for (var i = 0; i < numbers.length-(subStringLength-1); i++) {
			var newString =  numbers.substring(i,i+subStringLength);
			if (newString.search('0') != '-1' ) { // find if string contains 0 and skip further process as it returns 0
				continue;
				/* find the position of 0 and change loop index i to skip unnecessary calculations. for eg. string is 1230456789 and substring length is 4.
				at first iteration, substring is 1230 so 0 is in position 3, so further three substrings 2304, 3045, 0456 will contain 0, so we can skip these calculation by making loop index i = i+4 */
				i = i+subStringLength;
			}
				tempProduct = findProduct(newString); // calling function to find product
				if (tempProduct > greatestProduct) {
					greatestProduct = tempProduct;
					bestCombination = newString;
				}
			}
		// print results
		console.log("Product: " + greatestProduct);
		console.log("Combination: " + bestCombination);
	}

	function findProduct(newString){
		var product = 1;
		for (var i = 0; i < newString.length; i++) {
			product = product * newString[i];
		}
		return product;
	}
